title: Inquire About the Free Look Period
description: A customer who just purchased an annuity wants to know if they can still cancel it without penalty.

tasks.description: Identify the contract holder and the date the policy was issued.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the contract and sees it was issued 15 days ago.

tasks.description: Explain the 'free look' period and its duration for the customer's state.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent explains that the customer is still within their 30-day free look period.

tasks.description: If the customer wishes to proceed, process the cancellation and provide a full refund.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent processes the cancellation and full refund of premium.
